greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating row sums of Riordan triangle A321198.
comment: The row sums of triangle A321198 are given in A321199.
formula: G.f.: f(x)/(1 + x*f(x)), with f(x) = F^{[-1]}(x)/x = Sum_{n >= 0} (-1)^(n+1)*A001005(n)*x^n, where F^{[-1]}(x) is the compositional inverse of F(y) = y/(1 + y^2 - y^3) (see A077961 for F(y)/y).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 12 2018
